page.title: 08Other Village Organisations
page.content:
Many things are run as 4 parishes(p4) For Sports see p.6;for W.I. page 2
News & Views: a quarterly magazine produced with Limber (L) Kirmington & Croxton PCC:9 members. Kirmington Choir: Kirmington Playing Field Committee: Family Circle :(with L) aims to improve family life. 100+ Club Kirmington: raises funds for Kirmington village hall. Mother & Toddlers Group: Local History :class held with L. Rural Day Centre :run by W.R.V.S.for older residents. Play Group Kirmington:for children 2.5 years plus.15 t0 18 attend in 1985. Church Brigade : both boys and girls. run for all 4 parishes see page 2.
